sentences.en: Be thrifty and hardworking in whatever undertaking you are to start on.
He is, so to speak, a hardworking student.
sentences.cn: 他可说是个用功的学生.
他能力较弱,但工作还是勤勤恳恳的.

sentences.en: He's a hardworking but not very intelligent boy.
sentences.cn: 他是个用功的但不是很聪明的孩子。

sentences.en: I have never seen a man more hardworking than he.
sentences.cn: 我从来也没看见过像他这样勤奋的人.

sentences.en: I like your down - to - earth and hardworking spirit.
sentences.cn: 我就喜欢你们这股扎扎实实埋头苦干的劲儿.

sentences.en: It is generally known that the overseas Chinese are a hardworking lot.
sentences.cn: 众所周知华侨是刻苦耐劳的.

sentences.en: Mary is as hardworking as can be.
sentences.cn: 玛丽在班上之用功不输任何人.

sentences.en: Mary is, so to speak, a hardworking student.
sentences.cn: 玛丽可说是个用功的学生.

sentences.en: She was a simple, practical, hardworking woman.
sentences.cn: 她简朴, 实际, 勤奋.

sentences.en: The old man, a sincere , holy , hardworking, and simple man had a great influence on Ivan.
sentences.cn: 这位老人是位德高望重, 勤劳俭朴的人,他对伊凡影响很大.

sentences.en: They are intelligent, competent, loyal, and hardworking.
sentences.cn: 他们聪明 、 有能力 、 忠诚 、 并且埋头苦干.

sentences.en: They were sincere and hardworking people, and all very clever.
sentences.cn: 他们都严肃认真,聪明勤奋.

sentences.en: You're not going to deny that all my life , I've been hardworking, decent, respectable and straightforward.
sentences.cn: 你不会否认我这一辈子干活努力 、 正派体面, 受人尊敬而且光明正大吧?

trans.tran_cn: 苦干的，不辞辛劳的，用功，昧旦晨兴，刻苦
trans.tran_en: If you describe someone as hardworking, you mean that they work very hard
